content.text: Match ends, Napoli 3, Chelsea 1.
Second Half ends, Napoli 3, Chelsea 1.
Attempt missed. Edinson Cavani (Napoli) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Blerim Dzemaili with a cross following a set piece situation.
Walter Gargano (Napoli) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Frank Lampard (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Didier Drogba.
Attempt missed. Didier Drogba (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left.
Offside, Chelsea. Branislav Ivanovic tries a through ball, but Didier Drogba is caught offside.
Hand ball by Didier Drogba (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Goran Pandev (Napoli) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Walter Gargano.
Offside, Chelsea. Daniel Sturridge tries a through ball, but Didier Drogba is caught offside.
Foul by Paolo Cannavaro (Napoli).
Didier Drogba (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Gökhan Inler (Napoli) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Blerim Dzemaili.
Substitution, Napoli. Goran Pandev replaces Marek Hamsik.
Attempt blocked. Christian Maggio (Napoli) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Marek Hamsik.

Substitution, Chelsea. Michael Essien replaces Raul Meireles.
Goal!  Napoli 3, Chelsea 1. Ezequiel Lavezzi (Napoli) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Edinson Cavani.
